about_the_game:
We provide a chatbot service that responds to user input using our proprietary LLM (Large Language Model). Additionally, we aim to offer users an experience akin to conversing with specific characters by utilizing custom-developed prompts. While similar efforts are being made by various services, most rely on APIs, which incur significant costs that are often passed on to users.

By utilizing fixed-cost proprietary servers, we can significantly reduce these expenses, allowing us to offer this exciting new experience to a broader audience at a more affordable price.

In this process, we plan to incorporate various filters through blacklisting on our proprietary model. However, we acknowledge that there may be some loopholes in the early stages. That said, we are firmly committed to improving this through continuous updates to the blacklist.

Just as one can search for anything on Google but cannot justify eliminating Google because of the potential for extreme content searches, we believe our service can provide meaningful value to society.

content_descriptors.notes:
You will be able to interact with an AI that has a specific persona through chat. Just as we can search for anything on Google, you can talk about anything with the chatbot. Similar to how Google offers Safe Search to restrict certain types of content, we also plan to implement blacklisting to block such interactions.

However, just as Safe Search isn’t perfect, our system may also have limitations. That said, we are committed to continuously updating the blacklist to prevent any unwanted experiences and ensure the best possible environment for our users.

detailed_description:
We provide a chatbot service that responds to user input using our proprietary LLM (Large Language Model). Additionally, we aim to offer users an experience akin to conversing with specific characters by utilizing custom-developed prompts. While similar efforts are being made by various services, most rely on APIs, which incur significant costs that are often passed on to users.

By utilizing fixed-cost proprietary servers, we can significantly reduce these expenses, allowing us to offer this exciting new experience to a broader audience at a more affordable price.

In this process, we plan to incorporate various filters through blacklisting on our proprietary model. However, we acknowledge that there may be some loopholes in the early stages. That said, we are firmly committed to improving this through continuous updates to the blacklist.

Just as one can search for anything on Google but cannot justify eliminating Google because of the potential for extreme content searches, we believe our service can provide meaningful value to society.
name: KAW.AI

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB display memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

short_description: Uncensored AI chatbot. Customize the prompt for chatbots, images, facial expressions (image & video), and voices as you like. Experience everything AI can do! Fully supports the Steam Workshop. Nothing is stored on the server.
